options.content:
# Templar Version: ${templar_version}

Version data is automatically fetched from the version API

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_peers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "miner")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2" or r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_success_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tokens_per_sec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_own_before" or r._field == "loss_own_after" or r._field == "loss_random_before" or r._field == "loss_random_after")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss_own_improvement" or r._field == "loss_random_improvement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_scores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "weight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_scores")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "binary_indicator" or r._field == "binary_moving_avg" or r._field == "normalised_binary")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "validator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_inactivity" or r._measurement == "Vvalidator_slash")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "score_before" or r._field == "score_after")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field", "eval_uid"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Vvalidator_window_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_time" or r._field == "evaluation_time" or r._field == "model_update_time" or r._field == "peer_update_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "batch_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "model_update_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

// This measurement isn't currently submitted; once added to metrics_logger.log(), uncomment this query
// Currently not used - keeping for future implementation
/*
from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "optimizer_state_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
*/

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Mtraining_step_v2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "effective_batch_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Ebenchmark_task")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "score")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "evaluator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field", "task"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "Ebenchmark_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "benchmark_runtime_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "evaluator")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sys_cpu_usage" or r._field == "cpu_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sys_mem_used" or r._field == "sys_mem_total" or r._field == "mem_used" or r._field == "mem_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_mem_allocated_mb" or r._field == "gpu_mem_cached_mb" or r._field == "gpu_mem_total_mb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_mem_segments")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] =~ /${uid:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] =~ /${role:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] =~ /${group:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] =~ /${version:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["uid", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "mean")
